description: Libraries available for the AI coder to use. Add new libraries here and they will be included in the coder prompt.

charts.name: Chart.js
charts.description: Simple, modern charting library for bar, line, pie, doughnut, radar charts
charts.example: new Chart(ctx, { type: 'bar', data: { labels: ['A','B'], datasets: [{ data: [10,20] }] } })

charts.name: D3.js
charts.description: Powerful low-level data visualization library for custom charts

charts.name: Plotly
charts.description: Interactive scientific charts with zoom, pan, hover tooltips

charts.name: Apache ECharts
charts.description: Feature-rich charting with animations and large dataset support
charts.example: echarts.init(dom).setOption({ xAxis: {}, yAxis: {}, series: [{ type: 'bar', data: [1,2,3] }] })

charts.name: ApexCharts
charts.description: Modern charts with great animations and interactive features
charts.example: new ApexCharts(el, { chart: { type: 'line' }, series: [{ data: [10,20,30] }] }).render()

charts.name: Frappe Charts
charts.example: new frappe.Chart('#chart', { data: { labels: [...], datasets: [...] }, type: 'bar' })

tables.name: Tabulator
tables.description: Interactive tables with sorting, filtering, editing, pagination
tables.example: new Tabulator('#table', { data: [...], columns: [{ title: 'Name', field: 'name' }] })

tables.name: Grid.js
tables.description: Lightweight table plugin with search and pagination

styling.name: Tailwind CSS
styling.description: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development
styling.example: class="bg-blue-500 text-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow-lg hover:bg-blue-600"

styling.name: DaisyUI
styling.description: Component library for Tailwind CSS with pre-built UI components
styling.example: class="btn btn-primary" or class="card bg-base-100 shadow-xl"

styling.name: Animate.css
styling.description: CSS animations library for attention-grabbing effects

icons.name: Heroicons
icons.description: SVG icons from the makers of Tailwind CSS
icons.note: Use inline SVG from https://heroicons.com or copy SVG code directly

icons.name: Phosphor Icons
icons.description: Flexible icon family with multiple weights

utilities.name: Lodash
utilities.description: Utility library for arrays, objects, strings

utilities.name: Papa Parse
utilities.description: CSV parser for handling uploaded CSV files

utilities.name: Sortable.js
utilities.description: Drag and drop sorting for lists and grids

utilities.name: jsPDF
utilities.example: const doc = new jspdf.jsPDF(); doc.text('Hello', 10, 10); doc.save('file.pdf')

ui_components.name: HTMX
ui_components.description: Access AJAX, CSS Transitions, WebSockets directly in HTML
ui_components.note: Limited use in this sandbox due to fetch restrictions

analysis.name: Simple Statistics
analysis.description: Statistical functions: mean, median, stddev, percentile, linear regression

analysis.name: Math.js
analysis.description: Extensive math library with matrices, statistics, units

analysis.name: Arquero
analysis.description: Query and transform tables with a SQL-like API

ai.name: GE Runtime LLM
ai.description: Built-in AI assistant for text generation, analysis, and reasoning
ai.usage: const response = await window.geaRuntimeLLM('your prompt here');
ai.notes: This is the ONLY way to call AI. Do NOT use fetch/axios. Returns a string.

helper_functions.name: groupBy
helper_functions.description: Group array of objects by key
helper_functions.code: const groupBy = (arr, key) => arr.reduce((acc, obj) => { (acc[obj[key]] = acc[obj[key]] || []).push(obj); return acc; }, {});

helper_functions.name: sum
helper_functions.code: const sum = (arr) => arr.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0);

helper_functions.name: average
helper_functions.code: const average = (arr) => arr.length ? arr.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0) / arr.length : 0;

helper_functions.name: sortByKey
helper_functions.description: Sort array of objects by key
helper_functions.code: const sortByKey = (arr, key, desc = false) => [...arr].sort((a, b) => desc ? b[key] - a[key] : a[key] - b[key]);

helper_functions.name: debounce
helper_functions.code: const debounce = (fn, ms) => { let t; return (...args) => { clearTimeout(t); t = setTimeout(() => fn(...args), ms); }; };

helper_functions.name: parseCSVLine
helper_functions.description: Parse a single CSV line into array

helper_functions.name: downloadFile
helper_functions.description: Trigger file download from text content
helper_functions.code: const downloadFile = (content, filename, type='text/plain') => { const a = document.createElement('a'); a.href = URL.createObjectURL(new Blob([content], {type})); a.download = filename; a.click(); };

helper_functions.name: showLoading
helper_functions.code:
const showLoading = (show) => { let el = document.getElementById('loading-overlay'); if (!el && show) { el = document.createElement('div'); el.id = 'loading-overlay'; el.className = 'fixed inset-0 bg-black/50 flex items-center justify-center z-50'; el.innerHTML = '
'; document.body.appendChild(el); } if (el) el.style.display = show ? 'flex' : 'none'; };

helper_functions.name: showToast
helper_functions.code: const showToast = (msg, isError=false) => { const t = document.createElement('div'); t.className = `fixed bottom-4 right-4 px-6 py-3 rounded-xl shadow-lg text-white ${isError ? 'bg-red-500' : 'bg-green-500'} z-50`; t.textContent = msg; document.body.appendChild(t); setTimeout(() => t.remove(), 3000); };

ai_prompt_examples.name: Analyze Data
ai_prompt_examples.example: await window.geaRuntimeLLM(`Analyze this data and identify the top 3 trends: ${JSON.stringify(data)}`)

ai_prompt_examples.name: Generate Insights
ai_prompt_examples.example: await window.geaRuntimeLLM(`Given sales data, what are the key insights? Data: ${JSON.stringify(salesData)}`)

ai_prompt_examples.name: Explain Variance
ai_prompt_examples.example: await window.geaRuntimeLLM(`Explain why ${item.name} has a ${item.variance}% variance from target`)

ai_prompt_examples.name: Suggest Improvements
ai_prompt_examples.example: await window.geaRuntimeLLM(`Based on this performance data, suggest 3 improvements: ${JSON.stringify(metrics)}`)
